      • start

        public void start(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext context)
        Description copied from class: ComponentActivatorAbstractBase
        Method called by the OSGi framework when the OSGi bundle starts. The functionality we want to perform here are: 1) Register with the OSGi framework, that we are a provider of IContainerAware service and so in case of startup of a container we want to be called 2) Create data structures that allow to keep track of all the instances created per-container given the derived class of ComponentActivatorAbstractBase will act as a Factory manager
        Specified by:
        start in interface org.osgi.framework.BundleActivator
        Overrides:
        start in class ComponentActivatorAbstractBase
        Parameters:
        context - OSGi bundle context to interact with OSGi framework

      • setBroker

        public BindingAwareBroker.ProviderContext setBroker(BindingAwareBroker broker)
